Blog.post: Thinking Im sitting here, in my living room taking in my surroundings I see, a journal a bunny, a cd case I turn my head and stare at the computer screen waiting for anyone to get online I want to talk, i need to talk Im bursting with ideas I just need someone to explain myself to someone who will understand, i am who i am someway to let the pain out I want to understand myself I want to gain self confidence I just need someone who will understand, I want out of my personal prison

I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM I HATE HIM!!!!!!! WHY did he have to fuck up our lives?!?! WHY did he have ot be such an asshole?!?! i dont knwo and i dont care all i know is i never want to see him again NEVER. (BTW i was talking abot my father...)

id had a really bad day & i was at church, i wsa wearing my moms coat...and then all blakc clothes as usual, ok they told me i couldnt wear my mom coat(dont knwo why but....) and i was wearing short sleeves adn tehre was tons of freash cuts oin both side of my arms , so i tryied to hide it but one of the older guys at my church saw adn he took me out into this little room...and he said, "can you show me the rest of your cuts"(id put the coat back on) and i said "no"... and he said "ill have to call your mmom" and (for some reason she didnt know i was cutting again....and isaid no you wont she already knows...and i guesss he could tell i was lyiong he was like pull up your sleeves and i started ccrying and they were all over...i mean all over both sides of my arm all hte way up ot my shoulder...jsut my left arm tho... adn anyway he was reallly sweet and sympathetic about it and it made me want a dad more then ever before and tehn i was at home emailing my online dad...........the email said "i give up. you win. bye.forever."

i had a horrible evening. i wento my friends house and her dad read my other blog and ittsaid somehting really rude about her mom adn so he already didnt liek me but now i think he ahtes me :( but he told her mom so i otld her mom i was sorry...but iunno im reallyl upset..i dont know what (other hten the above) i ever did to him. Lee says taht its some weird feeeling i put off but i dont really beleive that :(..iuinnno :'(:'(

welll im depressed agian and i was writing in my otehr xanga and i had a bad abd thot i ahve nt thot liek this in so long but it went away (the htot was: iwant ot die) and im so scared it will come back i really need ot get happy fast!
anyone i need to talk...wow...i know...i have someone ot tlak to.. but he doesnt seem in the talkative mood...oh well...maybe so...i'll try

im scared, anxious, worried, and depressed...and i dont know why. i really really want to cut but...i know it will disapoint my online dad and my mom...i dont want to do that...ive already cut 35 times in the past week so...part of me knows it wont do me any good but dman it most of me doesnt give a rats ass about the risks or how stupid it is... i didnt think i was part of the big part, but now...im having my doubts...:(:/i just wnat to cut and cry...but i cant do either...and i know why i ncat cut but why the hell cant i cry?!?!? i wanna cry sooo bad...just let all the pain out...
hi anyone who cares to read this.

This is my ambivalence My pain and suffering It wont go away It nags at me every day Its trying to get me down And i hate to admit it But its succeeding Dragging me down Back to the lowest, The lowest of all prisons And now, once again I'm chained to my own mind And pulled between 2 beleifs
the past few days havent been as good. ive been kinda sad...and alot scared...and my sisters broke a few promises so ive just been pretty upset not much else to say ttyl

ive ahted him and ivethot that he raped me but now im thinking it was someone else...and then i falsaly accused him..woudl he ever forgive me? anywyas todya i found out that he wanted me to know that he loved and misssed me... it sscared me and it made me flip out ...i was like flipping out for an hour on the verge of tears and pulling at my hair what if it was like what i used to think, what H thinks, what if M did it...it would make much more sense to ME adn im the one whos supposed to know right? and H would know to since it was ehr also ...and...ok ...freak out mode..
is it a abd sign that i thot this? that for one or two fucking seconds i htot " i want to die"i ddont knwo and idont thin k icare either

I don't know what to do, im lost inside myself, looking for the answers Trying to form an argument, one that’ll get me off the hook Trying to escape the pain, trying to save myself, trying to do it my way And… I wanna hurt myself Just for the sake of livin’ I wanna save myself By hurting I wanna stop this pain With different pain There’s no help I can find, but only cos I don't seem to want it Even if I need it bad. Im trying to help myself, at the same time im masking the me Trying to escape their eyes, trying to hide away Trying to do it my way Cos I wanna hurt myself Just for the sake of livin’ I wanna save myself By hurting I wanna stop this pain With different pain Im gonna gain some strength, gonna rescues myself, Gonna try anyways Gonna try to improve myself, now im gonna help someone Try to help a friend, she says she’s considering my way It melted me-I was useless Now (repeat 3X) I wanna hurt myself Just for the sake of livin’ I wanna save myself By hurting I wanna stop this pain With different pain
someday, someone will disconver that im not who i apear to be and ill mask myself some other way cos no one can know that im so afraid
